titleStmt.title: A new method of cryptography, humbly presented to the most serene Majesty of Charles the II. By Samuel Morland knight and baronet, and one of the gentlemen of his Majestie's privy chamber in ordinary. 1666
titleStmt.author: Morland, Samuel, Sir, 1625-1695.
